job_title: Data Scientists, Machine Learning Engineers, AI Researchers, and Data Engineers
job_purpose: To tackle complex challenges and drive meaningful change through data-driven solutions by unlocking the power of data and transforming it into intelligent solutions.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Building and deploying machine learning models at scale
Designing data pipelines and infrastructure to power AI systems
Conducting cutting-edge research in NLP, computer vision, or generative AI
Leveraging big data to generate actionable business insights
Collaborating across teams to embed intelligence into real-world products
required_qualifications: Strong expertise in Python, SQL, and relevant data/ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Spark, etc.)
Experience working with large-scale datasets and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Ability to communicate complex technical ideas to non-technical stakeholders
preferred_qualifications: A curious mindset and a drive to innovate
company_details: A large global company that helps other businesses grow and improve by offering services in consulting, technology, and operations. It works with many different industries to solve problems and find better ways of doing things. Using new technology and smart ideas, the company supports its clients in becoming more efficient and successful. With teams around the world, it brings together experts who understand both business and technology.
